trans-unit.source: Now that you have walked through the basics of deploying Hyper-V, creating virtual machines and managing these virtual machines, let’s explore how you can automate many of these activities with PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: Now that you have walked through the basics of deploying Hyper-V, creating virtual machines and managing these virtual machines, let’s explore how you can automate many of these activities with PowerShell.

trans-unit.source: Return a list of Hyper-V commands
trans-unit.target: Return a list of Hyper-V commands

trans-unit.source: Click on the Windows start button, type PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: Click on the Windows start button, type PowerShell.

trans-unit.source: Run the following command to display a searchable list of PowerShell commands available with the Hyper-V PowerShell Module.
trans-unit.target: Run the following command to display a searchable list of PowerShell commands available with the Hyper-V PowerShell Module.

trans-unit.source: To list all virtual machines in a powered off state, run the following command.
trans-unit.target: To list all virtual machines in a powered off state, run the following command.

trans-unit.source: This command is a copy of the command from step 2 with the filter changed from ‘Running’ to ‘Off’.
trans-unit.target: This command is a copy of the command from step 2 with the filter changed from ‘Running’ to ‘Off’.

trans-unit.source: Start and shut down virtual machines
trans-unit.target: Start and shut down virtual machines

trans-unit.source: To start a particular virtual machine, run the following command with name of the virtual machine:
trans-unit.target: To start a particular virtual machine, run the following command with name of the virtual machine:

trans-unit.source: To start all currently powered off virtual machines, get a list of those machines and pipe the list to the 'start-vm' command:
trans-unit.target: To start all currently powered off virtual machines, get a list of those machines and pipe the list to the 'start-vm' command:

trans-unit.source: This document has shown some simple steps to explorer the Hyper-V PowerShell module as well as some sample scenarios.
trans-unit.target: This document has shown some simple steps to explorer the Hyper-V PowerShell module as well as some sample scenarios.

trans-unit.source: For more information on the Hyper-V PowerShell module, see the <linkText>Hyper-V Cmdlets in Windows PowerShell reference</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For more information on the Hyper-V PowerShell module, see the <linkText>Hyper-V Cmdlets in Windows PowerShell reference</linkText><title></title>.
